name: ext_R4B_ImplementationGuide_definition
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ImplementationGuide.definition for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.definition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: Information needed to build the IG
element.definition: The information needed by an IG publisher tool to publish the whole implementation guide.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.definition` has no related element in R3:ImplementationGuide

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
